snippet: Metropolitan Diary: Leaving her Midtown office for an hour to herself, a woman was struck by the stickiness and the clammy smells of Manhattan’s great outdoors.
abstract: Metropolitan Diary: Leaving her Midtown office for an hour to herself, a woman was struck by the stickiness and the clammy smells of Manhattan’s great outdoors.

headline.main: Lunch Break on a Hot Summer Day
